# Testing TSSB class

```{r}
library(bitphyloR)
n0 <- Node$new()
tssb <- TSSB$new(n0, data = matrix(rnorm(50),50,1), dpAlpha = 1, dpGamma = 1,
                 dpLambda = 1)
res <- tssb$GetMixture()
barplot(res$weight)
```

```{r}
tssb$FindNode(runif(1))
```
